Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"params":{"_paramController":"ParamController contract address","initialAdmin":"Address that will have Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeCommunityRole(uint256,address,bytes32)":{"params":{"communityId":"Community ID","role":"Role to revoke","user":"User to revoke role from"}},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. hvEooqPL"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/ERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2d9dc2fe26180f74c11c13663647d38e259e45f95eb88f57b61d2160b0109d3e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://81233d1f98060113d9922180bb0f14f8335856fe9f339134b09335e9f678c377","dweb:/ipfs/QmWh6R35SarhAn4z2wH8SU456jJSYL2FgucfTFgbHJJN4E"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]}},"version":1}

returns._0: ModuleAddresses struct containing all module addresses

returns.investorsBps: Investors pool share in basis points
returns.minWorkersBps: Minimum workers share in basis points
returns.spilloverTarget: 0 = spillover to workers, 1 = spillover to treasury
returns.treasuryBps: Treasury base share in basis points

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

initializeDefaultParameters(uint256).details: This function requires that the caller has governance permissions in ParamController

params.communityId: Community ID to initialize parameters for

params.name: Community name
params.parentCommunityId: Parent community ID (0 for root communities)

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.modules: ModuleAddresses struct with all module addresses

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

communities(uint256).notice: Mapping from community ID to community data

communityAdmins(uint256,address).notice: Community admins for easier access: communityId => user => isAdmin

communityRoles(uint256,address,bytes32).notice: Community-specific roles: communityId => user => role => hasRole

curators(uint256,address).notice: Mapping from community ID to curators

formAlliance(uint256,uint256).notice: Form an alliance between two communities

getCommunityModules(uint256).notice: Get all module addresses for a community

getEconomicParameters(uint256).notice: Get revenue policy parameters for a community

getModuleAddresses(uint256).notice: Get all module addresses for a community

grantCommunityRole(uint256,address,bytes.notice: Grant a community-specific role to a user

hasRole(uint256,address,bytes32).notice: Check if user has a specific role in a community

initializeDefaultParameters(uint256).notice: Initialize default parameters for a community

moderators(uint256,address).notice: Mapping from community ID to moderators

nextCommunityId().notice: Next community ID to be assigned

revokeCommunityRole(uint256,address,byte.notice: Revoke a community-specific role from a user

setModuleAddress(uint256,bytes32,address.notice: Set module address for a community

setModuleAddresses(uint256,(address,addr.notice: Set multiple module addresses at once
